hint.text: Point A and Point F signify room temperature and boiling point respectively.

solution.text: At time t=0, the temperature of water is _{m}_ degree celsius as represented by point A in the graph that lies on the y-axis

content.text:
A=(0,_{m}_), B=(1,_{j}_), C=(2,_{k}_), D=(3,_{l}_), E=(4,_{l}_), F=(8,100)
What was the initial temperature of water?
